page.title: 11HALL FARM cont. LANGTOFT
page.content:
FARMING HALL FARM CONTINUED
which pulls a machine which works the land down and gets it ready to grow crops on.Trailers are a cart which carries things We've got 1 combine,a combine is a machine which cuts the corn down and thrashes it. Thashing is the corn being bumped up and down so that the corn comes out of the ears. That is called winowing.Then the corn is carried into a tank and an auger empties the tank of corn in to a trailer and the corn is taken to a shed and tipped into a corn bin or silo and stored until it is needed.
writen by Dean Hallam.
